name: Senior Seminar: Topics in Global Asian Migrations
description: This course offers an in-depth study of important cultural issues in historical and contemporary Asian, diasporic and borderland societies, including migration, mobility, and circulation. It is conducted in seminar format with emphasis on discussion, critical reading and writing, digital skills, and primary research.
prerequisites: [[GASA01H3 and GASA02H3] and one C-level course from the options in the Specialist or Major program requirement #2] or [15.0 credits, including SOCB60H3]
